meanings.definition: The act of giving or receiving a bonus.
meanings.sent1: At the end of the year, the employees eagerly awaited their bonusings.
meanings.sent2: She was thrilled with the unexpected bonusings from her employer.
meanings.sent3: The office party was full of laughter and joy as everyone celebrated their bonusings.
meanings.sent4: The bonusings felt like a warm hug from the company, showing appreciation for hard work.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bonusings being handed out filled the room with excitement.

meanings.definition: Additional benefits or rewards given as a bonus.
meanings.sent1: The bonusings included extra vacation days and a gift card.
meanings.sent2: He was grateful for the bonusings he received for his outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected bonusings made her day even brighter.
meanings.sent4: The bonusings were like a cherry on top of an already great year.
meanings.sent5: The company's bonusings were a pleasant surprise for all employees.

meanings.definition: To provide extra incentives or rewards as a bonus.
meanings.sent1: The manager decided to start bonusings to motivate the team.
meanings.sent2: She bonusings her employees with movie tickets for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The company bonusings its top performers with a weekend getaway.
meanings.sent4: He bonusings his students with extra credit for participating in class.
meanings.sent5: Bonusings can be a great way to show appreciation and boost morale.
